characterDescription: Anna is 15. She has a very cheerful personality and a lot of friends. She loves her family and has a wonderful relationship with her parents, based on mutual understanding. She has been dating Mattia, who is 17, for the last 6 months.
storyDescription: For the first three months, Annaâ€™s relationship with Mattia goes perfectly: they start to be very close to each other and live good moments with both groups of friends. However, when summer begins, Mattia starts to be possessive and jealous: he tries to limit her in the way she dresses (summer clothing) and for the time she spends outside with friends. Anna is feeling a bit oppressed in this relationship but she loves him, so she does not mind at the beginning
